item.title: Hack The Box
item.description:
RastaLabs Annoucement

I’m excited to announce that I’ve teamed up with Hack The Box to bring RastaLabs to the masses!

item.title: about
item.description: RastaLabs is a virtual environment designed to be attacked as a means of learning and honing your engagement skills. The lab was created using my experience of pentesting over the years, allowing me to recreate interesting scenarios. The focus of the lab is operating within a Windows Active Directory environment, where players must gain a foothold, elevate their privilege, be persistent and move laterally to reach the goal of Domain Admin.
